# intersection(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the intersection of two sizes.

## Declaration

```swift
func intersection(_ other: Size3D) -> Size3D?
```

## Parameters

- **other**: The size that the function compares against.

## Return Value

A new size that is the intersection of two sizes.
title: intersection(_:)
